DOC.brief_title: Study Pharmacodynamic Parameter Tolerability With Subcutaneous Immunotherapy Grass Pollen Allergic Patients
DOC.criteria: A clinical history grass pollen induce allergic rhinoconjunctivitis two year require treatment grass pollen season Lack adequate relief symptomatic medication previous grass pollen season Positive Skin Prick Test ( SPT ) response Phleum pratense ( wheal diameter > = 3mm ) currently perform old 60 day screen FEV1 < 70 % predict value screen Bronchial asthma correspond GINA step 3 , even control History asthma exacerbation emergency visit admission asthma previous 12 month Previous treatment immunotherapy grass pollen allergen allergen within previous 5 year Exclusion criterion accordance contraindication SPC ALKFlex SQ
